org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Install Orangutan
Reset Gaia
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.content: #!/bin/sh -ex cd gaia GAIA_OPTIMIZE=1 NOFTU=1 make reset-gaia adb wait-for-device adb shell 'while [ ""`getprop sys.boot_completed` != "1" ] ; do sleep 1; done'

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Forward Marionette port via ADB
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Forward socket connections for connecting to Marionette

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Download B2G
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Download the B2G build from the specified location
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.content: #!/bin/bash -ex wget -r -l1 -nd -np -A.en-US.android-arm.tar.gz --user=${B2G_BUILD_USERNAME} --password=${B2G_BUILD_PASSWORD} $1 FILES="gaia.zip sources.xml $2.zip" for FILE in ${FILES}; do wget --user=${B2G_BUILD_USERNAME} --password=${B2G_BUILD_PASSWORD} $1/${FILE} done mv b2g-*.en-US.android-arm.tar.gz b2g.en-US.android-arm.tar.gz mv $2.zip device.zip

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Fetch test results
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Copy the historical test results from the remote dashboard

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Full flash B2G
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Perform a full flash on a B2G device

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Install NTP client
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Install NTP client on the device

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Run tests
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Run the tests and update the dashboard

org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.name: Shallow flash B2G (non-RIL)
org.jenkinsci.plugins.managedscripts.Scr.comment: Perform a shallow flash on a B2G device with a non-RIL build
